description: When a clinician (or interface) releases/unreleases a lab result to/from a web based chart system patient, tracking data for that action is stored in this table.

columns.name: ORDER_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure order record that is released/unreleased.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Since an order can be released/unreleased multiple times, the line number identifies a particular release instance.

columns.name: RELEASE_USER_ID
columns.description: The ID of the Hyperspace user who released/unreleased the lab result to the web based chart system patient.

columns.name: RELEASE_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item indicates the action taken on the lab result. The data stored is a category value. 1 corresponds to Released. 2 corresponds to Unreleased.   A null value also corresponds to Unreleased.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Release


Unrelease


Prevent autorelease

columns.name: MYC_REL_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Contains the instant when a result was released to MyChart in UTC.
